attributes.action: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to agree to providing vital information to local MP's and local Council's Social Services, as well as local NHS Trust's, about local servicemen and women, who have been either Killed-in-the-Line-of-Duty and/or Wounded-in-the-Line-of-Duty, so these local MP's and local Council's Social Services, as well as local NHS Trust's, can be given the ability and time to plan, or find financial and/or other resources to put into place, to provide help, assistance and support to their local servicemen and women as well as their families as soon as possible, without causing them and their families any unnecessary upset, distress or suffering and/or lost of benefits or welfare care and medical packages etc.
attributes.creator_name: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled] & Mr David M.C.Hughes[disabled]

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
